name: Aperion Cyberstorm
description: Work together to uncover a galactic conspiracy in Aperion Cyberstorm, a 2D twin-stick bullet hell for 1-5 players. Find new Elements and Abilities, and mix them for more destructive power in Campaign, Onslaught, and Versus modes!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, or later Processor: 2GHz or faster processors Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 3.0 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 600 MB available space
